extracted-table.table-caption: CSF parameters of PMS patients. Data including white cell count/µl, total protein in mg/dl, lactate in mmol/l, intrathecal IgG synthesis, oligoclonal bands, tau protein in pg/ml (reference range < 400 pg/mL), amyloid-ß in pg/ml (reference range > 600 pg/mL), CXCL13 in pg/ml, pNF-H in pg/ml, amyloid-ß 42/40, p-Tau 181 in pg/ml
extracted-table.table-wrap-foot: Abbreviations: OCB = oligoclonal bands, Aß = amyloid-ß, CXCL13 = C-X-C motif chemokine 13, pNF-H = neurofilament heavy chain

table-wrap-foot.p: Abbreviations: OCB = oligoclonal bands, Aß = amyloid-ß, CXCL13 = C-X-C motif chemokine 13, pNF-H = neurofilament heavy chain
